code.text:
graph LR
    A[Market Research] --> B[Product Planning]
    B --> C[Development]
    C --> D[Testing]
    D --> E[Manufacturing]
    E --> F[Marketing]
    F --> G[Sales]
    G --> H[Customer Support]
    H --> A
